评论概述: They need to change the fabric of the dresses.
评论详情: In the first two photos I am wearing the ones I purchased on Amazon they should fit more like my dress in the 3 Rd photo . But they don't because the dresses from Amazon have 4 % spandex in them which weighs the dress down and shows my flaws too much. If they made this dress with 100% polyester fabric the fit would be much better. I don't like to see my back rolls or lover handles and the dress with spandex shows all that I hate about myself . The 3 dress I purchased with stripes I bought from a site called daily deals . The makers of this dress should alter the way they are manufacturing this dress and only use 100% polyester in it . Also the spandex in the dress make it heavy in the chest area and that is why they have to add a stupid button to the dress . I don't like button but if you don't use the button the dress material falls down to easily and shows your bra or your nipple if you don't have a bra on under the dress. But if you notice my dress made of all polyester  doesn't need a snap. Bc it sits perfect over my breast area.  I'm trying to improve your design please make the change to $100 % polyester
This dress was super cute. I used it for my gender reveal party. The only thing I will say is the slit goes all the way up the dress so I had to wear shorts underneath.

Im 5’10” with a muscular/athletic build and this dress was able to accentuate my curves help me look a little daintier. It went all the way down to the floor so maybe watch out if you don’t have long legs or plan to wear flats.

I love these dresses! Super flattering, colorful, and comfortable. I will most likely get a 4th!  My Sizes For reference: -Between XL/2X, depending on the fit -Busty size 38DD -Normally 16/18 in dresses -5’4 / 189-195 lbs -Pants in between 14-16 depending on Brand

I absolutely love this dress, very flattering! So much so that I ordered 3 other ones. It’s great for warm weather with sandals & cooler days with a Jean jacket + wedges. Dress up for a date night or wear at the beach for casual day. Good weight and quality to it. Doesn’t hold wrinkles which is a plus too. LAUNDRY TIP: wash gentle cycle, cool water. Hang dry on a hanger folded over like a pair of pants to keep the straps from stretching.

Loved this for a summer wedding

I purchased this dress in emerald green for a wedding, and it's safe to say I'm absolutely in love with it! This dress is the epitome of elegance and comfort, making it a staple in my wardrobe for fancy events.  First off, the color is gorgeous—a rich emerald green that looks flattering against any skin tone. The fabric feels light and high quality, yet it's substantial enough not to be see-through. The wrap V-neck design adds a touch of sophistication while offering a customizable fit, making it versatile for various body types.  The length of the dress is just right, gracefully sweeping the ground without tripping me up as I walk. The flow of the dress when moving is beautiful, creating an almost ethereal effect that has garnered numerous compliments.  Overall, I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and versatile dress. It exceeds expectations in every category, from fit to functionality. A definite five-star rating from me!

Purchased as a last minute beach dress for vacation, and this dress came through. I do not typically buy clothes online because the fit is always more miss than fit, but…Perfect fit! Incredibly comfortable. I want to order 6 other designs. Very happy with this purchase!

I really liked how flattering this dress was. It accentuates the bust/neckline while being super flowy and forgiving around your midsection. The material is a casual knit but this still worked well for a summer wedding by dressing it up with jewelry, shoes, & hair.
This dress is exactly what I was looking for. It’s comfortable and flowy with a great slit. I’m 5’6” and the dress is a perfect length. It will be perfect for my vacation!

I bought this as an “option” for our upcoming wedding- it’s a keeper! I’m tall and curvy with 38DD chest, and this fits like a dream. There is a top modesty snap if needed, which I may remove, depending on how my undergarments affect the overall final look, but it’s nice to have the option. The long slit/overlap on the skirt is well made, allowing freedom of movement, showing a little leg when walking and sitting, but then falling nicely back into place when standing still. The fabric is lightweight but not see through, and the straps are adjustable - also a bonus. I’m very excited to wear this dress!
Not worth $40!

评论概述: So Freaking Comfortable but So Many Issues
评论详情: They really should be ashamed of themselves for trying to sell this for over $30 and as a "dress". The fabric is almost something between like cheapy Halloween costume and thin swim suit material, and is completely see through. Because of the style there is absolutely no way to wear a slip or bra underneath it, so it can't be worn out in public unless as a swimsuit cover up or something like that. Also I also ordered a small which is my normal size, my measurements are 32" chest, 28" waist, and 38" hips, and it fits me like a large with even more room to spare because it is so stretchy. I almost considered keeping it to wear around the house because it is so incredibly comfortable and soft, especially because I got it on a flash deal for like $10, but I returned it just based on principle.  P.S. Please ignore the mess in the back, I was in the middle of doing laundry, lol.
